pages.text: $(l)Flux Networks: Wireless Power Management$() $(br2)Flux Networks allows you to create customizable, wireless energy networks. Manage power generation, storage, and distribution all from a single, intuitive interface.

$(l)Key Features$() $(br2)- $(l)Wireless Power$(): Connect multiple machines wirelessly with ease. $(br2)- $(l)Custom Networks$(): Create networks with unique names and settings. $(br2)- $(l)Energy Control$(): Monitor, control, and optimize energy transfer.

$(l)Getting Started$() $(br2)- $(l)Flux Controller$(): The main hub of your network, allowing configuration and control. $(br2)- $(l)Flux Plug$(): Add energy to your network. $(br2)- $(l)Flux Point$(): Retrieve energy from your network.
$(l)More to Explore$() $(br2)- Explore the full potential of Flux Networks with wireless charging, priorities, and more. Customize your networks to create the perfect energy solution!
